name: Super Smash Tek
description:
Platform fighting game that allows the players to create their own character using a configuration file.

The goal of the game is to eject the other player out of the screen. The more your health is high the further you are sent when you get hit, like super smash bros.

There are 3 differents attacks possible whether you are on the ground or in the air. You can also use your shield to dodge the enemy's attack.

You have a double jump.

While in the air if you press Down you will land faster.

If you want to create your own character, please follow this documentation.

-------------------- Keyboard --------------------

******************* Player1 ******************

Attack1: V

Attack2: B

Attack3: N

Shield: G

Right: D

Left: Q

Jump: Z

Down: S

******************* Player2 ******************

Attack1: 1

Attack2: 2   

Attack3: 3

Shield: 5

Right: →

Left: ←

Jump: ↑

Down: ↓

-------------------- Controller --------------------

Attack1: ◻

Attack2: △

Attack3: O

Shield: R2 / L2

Right: → / Joystick

Left: ← / Joystick

Jump: ⨯

Down: ↓ / Joystick

-------------------- Training mode --------------------

Scale dow the time: + / L1

Scale Up the time: - / R1
